cause.description:
~ Well, i'd like an Ipod, never had one of those, looks cool ~ my computer is dying slowly and painfully, i would like to retire him to life as a TiVo for downstairs. ~ i'm getting my license in a few days, i need to pay for gas! ~ i need to go out and do things, and my money supply is running out quick!
1. Prevent rain from preventing me from lifeguarding.
cause.name: Timmy wants some money!
